configd:help.text: Configure the source address of Register packets sent by this DR
The name of the interface to use as the source of the register packets
IP address to use as the source of the register packets
Hash mask length for RP selection
Ignore the RP-SET priority value, and use only the hashing mechanism for RP selection
Configure the Anycast RP in the RP set
Configure the Anycast RP in the RP set
Destination IP address where Register messages are copied and sent
Enable the RP reachability check for PIM Registers at the DR
Configure the ability to filter out multicast sources specified by the given access-list at the RP
Turn off the ability of the last-hop PIM router to switch to SPT
Turn off the ability of the last-hop PIM router to switch to SPT
Enable the ability for the last-hop PIM router to switch to SPT for multicast group addresses indicated by the given access-list
Configure the option to calculate the register checksum over the whole packet
Configure the option to calculate the register checksum over the whole packet on multicast groups specified by the access-list
Configure a Keepalive Timer (KAT) value for (S,G) states at RP to monitor PIM register packets
Specify the group ranges for this candidate RP
Configure the rate of Register packets sent by this designated router (DR)
Define the 232/8 group range for SSM
Define an access-list for group range to use for SSM

Statically configure an RP address for multicast groups
